summary: ONCE THE VEHICLE IS AT "NORMAL OPERATING TEMPERATURE" THE POWER STEERING BECOMES HARD AND WILL SQUEAL.  I HAVE REPLACES THE POWER STEERING FLUID, IN ENTIRETY, AND THE PROBLEM STILL PERSISTS.  I PLAN ON GOING TO A DEALERSHIP ASAP, BUT READING ALL OF THE ARTICLES ON THIS VEHICLE, IT APPEARS THEY WILL TELL ME THE SAME.  IT IS A RACK-AND-PINION PROBLEM THAT I WILL HAVE TO INCUR AN OUT OF POCKET EXPENSE.   *NLM
